Review: Using robot camera since a week. Easy to install. user friendly mobile app through which I can access recordings and use its features..I installed in my living room. It also has a mic and speaker for two way communication. So whenever I‚Äôm away I can not only keep a watch the video but also can listen to the conversation and also speak...Cloud recording option is most valuable feature. My recording are safe always on cloud...It also automatically rotates and the tracks the human activity...It can trigger a siren sound on detection of human.Overall a very feature rich and fantastic product.Value for money product. Must go for it..
The camera quality is good and the two way communication work well. The night vision is also good.

I ordered this cctv camera and check for the working but it didn't work. So I contacted the customer service they supported and told that they will delivered next day. But the delivery guy was arrogant and he didn't delivered on time . Still I haven't received and my money is stuck

It' works well .Camera quality nice.First few times I failed  to connect with wifi connectivity. It' works with wifi router . But am going far , I am not able to view in my mobile. I viewed lots of videos, and their manual too. But not successful.So I request to return it.But accidentally, I switch on my hotspot in my mobile , when I near to cam and wifi router.It's solved . Now am viewing my cam  remotely.Reasons I like this camera:1. It's picture quality.2. Speaker sound very loud comparing to my other cameras.3. Humanoid mode is a very good option in this . Camera automatically rotates towards human moving.4. It's price.Almost half the rate comparing to Mi, Vivo, and other companies.Note:These below lines now am writing after 10 days of usage.Recording videos most of time vanished.When I playback my last recordings, sometimes it says no RECORDING

I liked the features of the camera, easy to install and quality if the video is also good. It's value for money.But the product doesn't come with holder or stand to fix it with wall. That's a drawback for me.If someone wants to just place the camera on top of any thing then it's fine.
